title: Vaidooryam Haaralu: Emerald Bead Necklace with Antique Gold Pendant
features: This exquisite haaram features seven strands of meticulously strung emerald beads. The pendant is crafted in antique gold using traditional nakshi work techniques and set with polki diamonds. The central ruby exhibits a beautiful carved pattern. The pendant is designed in a floral motif with emerald accents.
description: A testament to Hyderabad's rich jewelry heritage, this haaram combines the auspiciousness of emeralds with the opulence of antique gold. The meticulous craftsmanship and high-quality gemstones make it a timeless heirloom. The Hyderabadi polish enhances the gold's luster, ensuring lasting beauty.
